for_sales.sales_text: Rare opportunity to own wooden gaff cutter Shoal Waters. Owner retiring. New sails. Yard trailer. Spare original sails. Ghoster sail. Topsail. Canvas sail cover. Cockpit cover. Boat cover. Cockpit tent. Anchor, 90' chain. Binnacle Compass. Nav lights. Etc. Viewed Essex. Serious enquiries only please

boat.full_description:
Shoal Waters was built from the best hull available and completed in 1963 to owner Charles Stock's own design using gear from an old half-decker bought in 1948. She took part in the 1st and 50th East Coast races.

Over 70,000 nautical miles have been made good from Maldon between Whitby, Ostend and the Solent. Charles Stock wrote many books about his sailing activities and there are references to these on the boat's website.
boat.name: Shoal Waters
boat.short_description: Charles Stock built Shoal Waters to his own design in 1963 and sailed her on the East Coast of England until his death in 2012.
